issue.title: [JS] Optimally use closure compiler
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12393](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12393). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Closure compiler made sense when es5 was the default since it produces better results but now that es2015 is the default, we should check for which targets it makes sense.
